title.en: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.

altTitles.ja: 高度に発達した医学は魔法と区別がつかない

altTitles.ja-ro: Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku wa Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai
Koudo ni Hattatsu Shita Igaku ha Mahou to Kubetsu ga Tsukanai

altTitles.en: Any Sufficiently Advanced Medical Science Is Indistinguishable From Magic
Highly Advanced Medicine Is Indistinguishable From Magic
I Used High-Level Medicine to Counter Magic

altTitles.ne: उच्च विकसित औषधी जादू भन्दा कम छैन

altTitles.es-la: La medicina altamente desarrollada no se puede diferenciar de la magia

description.en:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
description.ja: 医療魔法が独占された異世界に転移した現役医師・天海唯人。スライム、キマイラ、獣人…はじめて出会う住人たちに驚きながらも、わずかな医療器具と自身の知識で、病魔や怪我に立ち向かう。果たして彼は異世界の住人たちを治療し、苦しむ人々を救うことができるのか。
description.es-la:
¿Funciona la medicina moderna en otro mundo? Sin trampas ni equipos modernos. Un médico se enfrenta a un mundo dominado por la magia. El doctor Amami Yuito es transferido a un mundo diferente donde la magia médica está monopolizada. Slimes, quimeras, hombres bestia... Le sorprenden los habitantes con los que se encuentra por primera vez, pero con el poco equipo médico que tiene y sus propios conocimientos, es capaz de combatir enfermedades y heridas.
¿Podrá curar a los habitantes del otro mundo y salvar a los que sufren? Una fantasía de "Mundo diferente" x "médico" sin trampas ni equipos modernos, escrita por Tsuda Houkou que además es un médico en funciones e ilustrada por el prometedor Takishita Nobuhide!

altTitles.ja: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description.en: Junpei is happily snoozing away during his sister's ballet recital when a male ballet dancer steps onto the stage. Moved by the strength and skills the dancer displays, the boy discovers his love for this art. But after a certain tragedy happens, he vows to leave his past behind and turn into the epitome of manliness. What will he do when his love for ballet reignites?!
description.ja: 主人公・村尾潤平は中学二年生。幼い頃にバレエに魅了されるも、父の死をきっかけに「男らしくならねば」とその道を諦める。バレエへの未練を隠しながら格闘技・ジークンドーを習い、クラスの人気者となった潤平だが、彼の前に、ある日転校生の美少女・五代都が現れる。母親がバレエスタジオを経営する都に、バレエへの興味を見抜かれ、一緒にやろうよと誘われるが――！？すべてを犠牲にしたものだけが、立つことを許される世界。重力に逆らい、美しく高く跳ぶものたちよ、抗いがたきその衝動に、身を捧げよ――

altTitles.ja: 不老不死少女の苗床旅行記

altTitles.en: The Nursery Travel Report by a Immortality Girl
The Immortal Girl's Nursery Travelogue

altTitles.vi: Bồn Chứa Tinh Bất Tử Phiêu Lưu Ký

altTitles.en: Depravity Records by an Immortality Girl

altTitles.zh-hk: 不老不死少女的苗床旅行記

description.en: The journey of a genius girl who became immortal to grant her dreams of being bred to different species of creatures in order to fulfill her curiosity.
description.ja: 「ボク、異種生物の苗床になってみたい」――天才少女プルートは苗床願望を叶えるため、不老不死の体を手に入れた！　好奇心旺盛な彼女は、異世界の美少女たちや異種生物たちとエッチで自由な旅を謳歌する！
description.es-la: Plute una bibliotecaria que ha leído todos los libros de su biblioteca, se adentra a los grimorios prohibidos y con el fin de saciar su curiosidad, ahora busca aparearse con todo tipo de especies.

altTitles.en: Secretly, Secretly; But Unable to Hide It
Hidden Love
My Secret Crush

description.en: That year, someone secretly wormed their way into Sang Zhi's heart and she fell in love with her brother's friend Duan Jiaxu. That older brother has beautiful peachy eyes and casually calls her a "kid". That spark of surprise when they first met made Sang Zhi want to slowly get closer to him, but the 7-year age difference felt like an insurmountable gap that she couldn't cross over. Not knowing when it started, the crush buried at the bottom of her heart sprouted, and slowly, it spread into his heart too...
description.zh: 那年，桑稚的心里偷偷地住进了一个人，喜欢上哥哥的朋友段嘉许，这个大哥哥有着好看的桃花眼，漫不经心的喊她“小孩”，初见的惊艳总是让桑稚忍不住想要靠近，但是7岁的年龄差仿佛又是他们无法逾越的鸿沟，不知从何时起，埋藏在心底的青涩暗恋逐渐发芽，慢慢地，也蔓延进了他的心里...【

altTitles.ja: バンプアー

altTitles.en: Bumpman Poor

description.en: His life hits rocks bottom, but he is the ultimate in assassinations. The legend of a hitman with absolute lethality begins. 333 yen in his pocket. Occupation: assassin. In a life of extreme poverty, all he has is hunger and his mission. Whenever his stomach rumbles, the poor but strong Nojima Ryou appears, shattering both reality and fiction! The start of a pitch-black assassination drama depicted with overwhelming realism!!
description.vi:
Cuộc sống đang ở đáy, và sự ám sát đang ở đỉnh cao. Truyền thuyết về sát thủ cực kỳ nguy hiểm khai mạc từ đây.

Anh ta có 333 yên. Nghề nghiệp: sát thủ. Trong cuộc sống cực kỳ nghèo khó, tất cả những gì tồn tại chỉ là đói khát và nghĩa vụ. Ryo Nojima, một người đàn ông nghèo nhưng mạnh mẽ xuất hiện khi bụng anh bắt đầu cồn cào, phá hủy cả thực tế và hư cấu!
Câu chuyện ám sát đen tối, được miêu tả với hiện thực choáng ngợp, bắt đầu!!

title.en: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Story of Tsukasa Kadoya Sensei in Schale (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja: シャーレの門矢士先生概念

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive x Kamen Rider Decade - Câu chuyện về thầy giáo Schale Kadoya Tsukasa

description.en: Anyone who is a fan of the Kamen Rider genre probably knows Kamen Rider Decade, also known as Kadoya Tsukasa;  world destroyer... The story is about Decade working as a sensei in the Blue Archive world

title.en: Yuumei VTuber no Ani Dakedo, Nazeka Ore ga Yuumei ni Natteita

altTitles.ja: 有名VTuberの兄だけど、何故か俺が有名になっていた

altTitles.en: I'm the Older Brother of a Famous VTuber, But for Some Reason I Became Famous

description.en:
I have a stepsister named Isuzu. She is a super popular VTuber with over 1 million subscribers, "Isuzu Wine".

One day, she forgot to turn off her stream, and our candid conversation was accidentally broadcasted worldwide!
The clip of the streaming incident quickly went viral, and overnight, I became an internet sensation...!?

The more accidents happen, the more popular she gets!!
Together with my overly beautiful and clingy stepsister, and a cute senior VTuber, I aim to rise in the streaming industry!

A rising star VTuber romantic comedy!
description.id:
Aku punya adik tiri bernama Isuzu. Dia adalah VTuber super populer dengan lebih dari 1 juta subscriber, "Isuzu Wine".

Suatu hari, dia lupa mematikan siaran, dan percakapan aslinya denganku tanpa sengaja tersebar ke seluruh dunia!
Potongan video insiden siaran itu dengan cepat menyebar, dan dalam semalam, aku mendadak jadi selebriti internet...!?

Semakin banyak insiden, semakin melonjak popularitasnya!!
Bersama adik tiri yang manja dan terlalu cantik, serta senior VTuber yang imut, aku mulai meniti karir di dunia streaming!

Kisah komedi romantis tentang VTuber yang mendadak naik daun!
description.ja: 俺には義理の妹、いすずがいる。彼女は登録者数100万人突破の大人気VTuber【いすずワイン】。そんな彼女がある日、配信を切り忘れ、俺との素の会話を世界中に流してしまう！配信事故の切り抜き動画は瞬く間に拡散され、一夜にして俺はネットの人気者になってしまい……!?事故れば事故るほど人気沸騰!!甘えたがりの美人すぎる義妹や、同じくVTuberの可愛い先輩とともに配信業界を駆け上がれ！！
description.es-la:
Tengo una hermanastra llamada Isuzu. Ella es la popular VTuber "Isuzu Wine", con más de un millón de suscriptores. Un día, ella se olvidó de cortar la transmisión y nuestras conversaciones privadas se transmitieron al mundo entero. El video del accidente se difundió rápidamente, y en una noche me convertí en una celebridad en Internet... 

¡Cuanto más accidente, más popularidad! ¡Acompaña a mi hermosa y cariñosa hermanastra y a una linda senpai que también es VTuber mientras ascendemos en la industria de las transmisiones! ¡Una comedia romántica de VTubers que se eleva al éxito!

altTitles.ja: 星交O者

description.en: Unable to accept the death of his best friend Octo-chan, Yota makes a forbidden wish on a night of despair. What appeared before his eyes was...? The genius Ichinohe-sensei debuts with an impactful serialization! A new sensational fantasy tale of everlasting friendship!!

altTitles.ja: きみのためのエデン

altTitles.en: An Eden for You

description.en:
"Please... Kiss Me"

The young man, Yuusei Hakozaki, carries the memory of being kidnapped and confined along with six girls during his childhood. One day, as an adult leading a peaceful life, a girl suddenly appears before him and demands a kiss...!?

Yuusei is told of a single "rule": He must kiss the girls once every 24 hours. If he fails to do so, their heads will explode and they will die.

To save the girls from their deadly fate, Yuusei starts a communal life with them where he must "kiss them every day." In this closed-off miniature Eden, the story begins to unfold. Can Yuusei discern their lies and truths and find his one destined partner?
description.id: "Tolong ― Cium Aku"Hakozaki Yuuki, seorang pemuda yang dihantui kenangan tentang penculikan dan penyekapan bersama enam gadis sewaktu kecil, menjalani kehidupan tenang dan biasa sebagai orang dewasa. Namun, ketenangannya hancur ketika salah satu gadis tersebut tiba-tiba muncul di depannya dan memintanya untuk menciumnya!Yuuki dihadapkan pada satu aturan mengerikan:Dia harus mencium setiap gadis itu sekali dalam 24 jam.Jika dia gagal melakukannya, kepala mereka akan meledak, menyebabkan kematian mereka.Bertekad untuk menyelamatkan mereka dari nasib tragis ini, Yuuki memulai hidup bersama dengan para gadis tersebut, dengan misi "mencium mereka setiap hari." Di tengah kehidupan bersama dalam dunia yang tertutup ini, cerita mulai terungkap.Di balik kebohongan dan kebenaran para gadis, Yuuki harus memahami perasaan mereka yang sebenarnya dan mengungkap rahasia masa lalu mereka. Bisakah dia menemukan satu-satunya takdir sejatinya?
description.pt-br:
"Por favor... Beije-me"

O jovem Yuusei Hakozaki carrega a memória de ter sido sequestrado e mantido em cativeiro junto com seis garotas durante sua infância. Um dia, já adulto e levando uma vida pacífica, uma garota aparece repentinamente diante dele e exige um beijo...!?

Yuusei é informado de uma única "regra": ele deve beijar as garotas uma vez a cada 24 horas. Se falhar, suas cabeças explodirão e elas morrerão.

Para salvar as garotas desse destino mortal, Yuusei começa a viver com elas, onde precisa "beijá-las todos os dias". Nesse pequeno Éden fechado, a história começa a se desenrolar. Será que Yuusei conseguirá distinguir suas mentiras e verdades e encontrar sua única parceira predestinada?

altTitles.ja: ピープ

description.en: The popular gal who was my childhood friend is secretly uploading provocative selfies!? In his quest to uncover the secret of this popular girl, high school boy Riku discovers that his own deeply hidden emotions were being observed by someone else… A sweet yet suffocatingly intense blend of youth, love, and suspense.
description.ja: 幼なじみの人気ギャルは、過激な自撮りをアップする裏アカ女子！？人気者の秘密を探ろうとする男子高校生・陸は、逆に自分の隠していた心の底を、別の誰かに覗かれていたことを知る‥‥。溺れるほどに甘く、息もできないほど苦しい、青春×愛憎サスペンス。
description.es-la:
¿La chica popular que era mi amiga de la infancia está subiendo en secreto provocativos selfies de cosplay?
En su búsqueda por descubrir el secreto de esta chica popular, el chico de instituto Riku descubre que sus propias emociones, profundamente ocultas, estaban siendo observadas por otra persona...

Una dulce pero asfixiante mezcla de juventud, amor y suspenso.

title.en: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai

altTitles.en: Gate - Piña's Rose Order of Knights
Gate - Rose Knights of the Empire - 14 Year Old Pinya Co Lada

altTitles.ja-ro: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai

altTitles.ja: ゲート 帝国の薔薇騎士団 ピニャ・コ・ラーダ14歳

altTitles.zh-hk: 門 帝國之薔薇騎士團 平娜‧戈‧蘭達14歲

description.en: A spin-off focusing on Princess Pinya's (from "Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There!") life before the "Gate" opening to the other world event.

title.en: Mitsuishi-san is Being Weird This Year

altTitles.ja: 今年の三石さんはどこかおかしい

altTitles.ja-ro: Kotoshi no Mitsuishi-san wa Dokoka Okashil
Kotoshi no Mitsuishi-san ha Dokoka Okashii
Kotoshi no Mitsuishi-san wa Doko ka Okashii

altTitles.en: There's Something Strange About Mitsuishi-san This Year

altTitles.zh-hk: 今年的三石同學哪裡有點怪

altTitles.vi: Mitsuishi-san năm nay cứ là lạ

altTitles.ja: 三石さん

altTitles.en: Mitsuishi-san

description.en:
A notebook? A jersey!? Gym clothes!?!? What do you want to borrow?

Mitsuishi constantly takes care of her classmate Hajime, a lethargic boy. What made the cool honor student Mitsuishi suddenly change over the past year?

altTitles.ja: タダでは抱かれません

altTitles.en: I Won't Sleep with You for Free

altTitles.id: Aku Gak Nidurin Kamu Secara Cuma-cuma

altTitles.th: ชีวิตพลิกผัน ฉันขายตัวให้เพื่อน

description.en: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
description.id: Kirishima Miyako, mahasiswa di sebuah universitas khusus wanita dan calon guru, adalah seorang gadis miskin yang menjalani hidup serba hemat. Suatu hari, setelah ditraktir oleh teman gadisnya Nakano Yui, dia diajak untuk mengunjungi ke love hotel. Namun, dia menolaknya karena enggan untuk berhubungan seks dengan temannya. Sampai kemudian, Yui menawarkannya 30.000 yen jika Miyako menerima ajakannya. Sejak saat itu, Miyako melakukan lebih banyak "transaksi" dengan teman-temannya yang lain dari universitasnya!? Kisahpun Yuri tentang persahabatan, uang dan seks pun dimulai.
description.th: คิริชิมะ มิยาโกะ สาวมหาลัยยาจกที่ใฝ่ฝันอยากเป็นครู ได้จับพลัดจับผลูไปเข้าโรงแรมม่านรูดกับเพื่อนซี้นามว่า นากาโนะ ยุย โดยเธอขอมีเซ็กส์ด้วยโดยแลกกับเงิน 30000 เยน! แบบนี้มีหรือมิยาโกะจะไม่เอา!

title.en: Maigo no Onnanoko o Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.ja: 迷子の女の子を家まで届けたら、玄関から出て来たのは学年一の美少女でした

altTitles.ja-ro: Maigo no Onnanoko wo Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita

altTitles.en: When I Brought a Lost Girl Home, the Most Beautiful Girl in My Grade Came Out the Front Door
She Is the Beautiful Girl in the School Year

altTitles.vi: Đưa bé gái bị lạc trở về, người mở cửa là hoa khôi của khối

description.en:
One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! 

"As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? 

A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!
description.ja:
恋愛経験ゼロの陰キャ高校生・黒田雄星がある日、迷子になっていた幼女を家まで届けると… 学年一の美少女・白河綾乃が出現!!

「妹を助けてくれたお礼に」と、なぜか彼女が大胆に迫ってくるようになり、毎日がハプニング状態!?
更に巨乳オタク同級生や、かまってちゃんな後輩女子も登場し、一気に華やかな日常に――!?

“憧れのあの子”と急接近して、運命が変わる学園ラブコメ！

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Inkya Joshi ga Oshi Utai Datta ~Ore no Kyoku wo Uttatekure!~

altTitles.ja: 隣の席の陰キャ女子が推し歌い手だった ～俺の曲を歌ってくれ！～

altTitles.ja-ro: Tonari no Seki no Inkya Joshi ga Oshi Utai Datta ~Ore no Kyoku wo Uttatekure!~

altTitles.en: The "Inkya" Girl Sitting Next To Me Was My Favorite Singer. Sing My Song!

altTitles.vi: Cô bạn trầm tính bàn bên hóa ra lại là ca sĩ mà tôi mến mộ ~Bài hát này của tôi, hãy hát lên đi nào!~

description.en:
"Why is my favorite singer singing my song!?"

Tsunagu Kurose, a high school student with a passion for musics composing but a terrible singing voice, often receives criticisms whenever he posts them on the Internet. One day, while shouldering the responsibility of taking commemorative photos of the culture festival reluctantly with Otoha Hinomori - a quiet classmate sitting next to him, his childhood friend Tetsu Tamura was in a dilemma because of unavoidable accidents occuring on the stage run by his club. Without hesitation, Tsunagu gives him the demo instrumental songs he composed to save the situation. Unfortunately, Tetsu open the wrong music file with Tsunagu's terrible lyrics, making him feels like he wanna hole up due to that unfortunate disaster. In despair at this miserable situation, Otoha takes off her thick glasses, tightly grips the microphone and hums that song! 

"Isn't this voice similar to icy - the singer I've always admired...!?"
(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
description.ja:
「どうして俺の曲を、憧れの歌い手が歌ってるんだ!?」
高校生・黒瀬繋玖(くろせつなぐ)は、歌唱は微妙だが作曲してネットに投稿するのが趣味。
ある日隣の席の陰キャ女子・氷ノ守音羽(ひのもりおとは)と学園祭の写真係になる。
当日友人のピンチに自分の楽曲を提供するが、流れたのは聴くに堪えないデモテープバージョン。
悲惨な状況に絶望したそのとき、マイクを手に歌唱したのは地味眼鏡を外した音羽だった!
その歌声は憧れの推し歌い手icyそのもので…!?
description.vi:
"Tại sao bài hát của mình, lại được ca sĩ mình yêu thích hát vậy chứ!?"

Tsunagu Kurose, nam sinh cấp ba với niềm đam mê sáng tác nhạc cùng giọng hát dở tệ, thường nhận phải gạch đá khi đăng tải chúng lên mạng. Một ngày nọ, trong lúc đang gánh vác công việc chụp những bức hình kỉ niệm ngày hội văn hóa bất đắc dĩ cùng cô bạn trầm tính bàn bên Otoha Hinomori, cậu bạn thưở nhỏ Tetsu Tamura đã rơi vào tình cảnh tiến thoái lưỡng nan vì một vài sự cố bất khả kháng diễn ra ngay trên sân khấu do CLB cậu điều hành. Không do dự, Tsunagu đã đưa cho cậu dùng bản demo không lời của bài nhạc sáng tác ra để cứu vãn tình hình, nhưng trớ trêu thay Tetsu lại mở nhầm file nhạc có lời hát tệ hại của Tsunagu khiến cho cậu như muốn chui tọt xuống đất vì thảm họa oái oăm đấy. Ngay lúc tuyệt vọng nhất, Otoha gỡ bỏ chiếc kính dày cộm của mình, nắm chặt chiếc micro ngân nga khúc ca ấy!

Và rằng "Giọng hát ấy chẳng phải giống với ca sĩ mà mình vẫn luôn mến mộ - icy hay sao...!?

title.en: I Look Too Much Like the Boss and the World Actually Believes It

altTitles.zh: 长的太像BOSS，结果世人真的信了

altTitles.zh-ro: Zhang De Tai Xiang BOSS, Jieguo Shiren Zhen De Xinle
Zhǎng De Tài Xiàng BOSS, Jiéguǒ Shìrén Zhēn De Xìnle

altTitles.en: The Appearance Is So BOSS-like, yet Everyone Believes It

description.en: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
description.zh: 月之王，苏凉！操纵着能回溯时空、逆转阴阳的月神闪蝶，以此站在这个世界的顶点的无敌少年！ 穿越而来就拿到这么NB的身份卡，岂不是天胡开局……个屁咧！ 我体内的宠兽，哪是什么月神闪蝶！！根本只是个只能照明的最最最低阶的闪光蝶！！！ 面对数以百万的狂热信徒、三年后约战的沧月大帝、视自己为眼中钉的各大教派…… 这还真是…… 前所未有的御兽大危机！

altTitles.ja: チェンソーマン

description.en:
Broke young man + chainsaw dog demon = Chainsaw Man!  
  
The name says it all! Denji's life of poverty is changed forever when he merges with his pet chainsaw dog, Pochita! Now he's living in the big city and an official Devil Hunter. But he's got a lot to learn about his new job and chainsaw powers!
description.fr:
Pour rembourser ses dettes, Denji, jeune homme dans la dèche la plus totale, est exploité en tant que Devil Hunter avec son chien-démon-tronçonneuse, “Pochita”. Mais suite à une cruelle trahison, il voit enfin une possibilité de se tirer des bas-fonds où il croupit ! Devenu surpuissant après sa fusion avec Pochita, Denji est recruté par une organisation et part à la chasse aux démons…

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kazé / Crunchyroll**

title.en: Why I Quit Being the Demon King

altTitles.id: Alasan Mengapa Aku Berhenti Jadi Raja Iblis

description.en:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?

altTitles.ja: シブヤニアファミリー

description.en: A small series that frankly depicts the circumstances of a third-grade girl living in Shibuya and her family.
description.ja:
渋谷に住む小３女子とその家族の事情を赤裸々に描く小型連載。
最後に書いてある「しぶや係日誌」も見てね。

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

altTitles.en: Superball Girls

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
description.ja: 人生で自分にとっての「一番」をずっと心にしまい続けながら、チョコレート工場での仕事を続ける一好瑛太。クリスマスの夜、帰宅中の彼は暗闇から転がる不思議なスーパーボールを手にする。日常への様々な思いをぶつけるように、そのボールを思い切り投げつけた彼の前にいきなり現れたのは理想の「美女」．．．！？
description.pt-br: Ichiyoshi continua trabalhando em uma fábrica de chocolate, trancando o seu "melhor" em seu coração. Numa noite de Natal, a caminho de casa, ele encontra uma misteriosa super bola que  cai da escuridão...

altTitles.en: Destruction Lover

altTitles.ja: 破滅の恋人

description.en:
Is that woman a ghost or a witch?
A chance encounter between a girl and a beautiful, but not ghostly, girl who lives in a haunted house like a secret base.

altTitles.ja: 廻天のアルバス

description.en:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late.

The Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed Hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

The Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
description.ja: 魔王を倒した。世界は平和に。でも、間に合わなかった。なぜかこの冒険を繰り返している勇者アルバスは、急ぎたい。これは世界を救う物語であり、そして――
description.vi:
Ma vương đã bị đánh bại... Thế giới sẽ hòa bình trở lại. Nhưng... Đã quá muộn rồi... Anh hùng Albus thật sự đang rất vội. Câu chuyện tua ngược, như thể một cách tự nhiên, trở lại nơi mọi chuyện khởi đầu.

Người anh hùng đầy hiểu biết Albus với đôi mắt lờ đờ như thiếu ngủ, dấn thân vào một cuộc phiêu lưu mới, nơi “thời gian là thứ quan trọng nhất”.

Được đăng dài kỳ trên Weekly Shounen Sunday, nơi đã đăng tải siêu phẩm “Thám tử lừng danh Conan”, người Anh hùng Albus tìm cách giành lại tương lai mà anh ấy mong muốn từ quá khứ trong thế giới fantasy “speedrun” một cách đúng nghĩa này!
description.es-la: El Rey Demonio es derrotado... El mundo está en paz. Pero fue demasiado tarde... El héroe Albus tiene prisa. La historia da vueltas y comienza de nuevo desde el principio, como si fuera algo natural. ¡Esta es una fantasía de re-aventura de alta velocidad donde "el tiempo es lo más importante" para el experto héroe Albus.

altTitles.en: Miss Kobayashi’s Dragon Maid - Full Color Edition

altTitles.ja: 小林さんちのメイドラゴン　フルカラーコミック

altTitles.en: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon (Official Colored)
The maid dragon of Kobayashi-san (Official Colored)

description.en: Miss Kobayashi is your average office worker who lives a boring life, alone in her small apartment–until she saves the life of a female dragon in distress. The dragon, named Tohru, has the ability to magically transform into an adorable human girl (albeit with horns and a long tail!), who will do anything to pay off her debt of gratitude, whether Miss Kobayashi likes it or not. With a very persistent and amorous dragon as a roommate, nothing comes easy, and Miss Kobayashi’s normal life is about to go off the deep end!

altTitles.ja: 離婚しない男 CASE２

altTitles.vi: Người đàn ông không thể ly hôn CASE 2

description.en:
Jou Nagase is a popular and competent top class actor. He's also a devoted family man, but one day a photograph of him purportedly having an illicit meeting with a rookie actress surfaced. 
In an instant, the actor "NagaJou" ended up losing both his family and his social status. However, it was all a fabricated plot. Behind the scenes was someone unexpected.

Betrayal, secrets and schemes all intertwine in Rikon Entertainment's second installment!!

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 人気、実力ともトップクラスの俳優・永瀬丈。良き家庭人でもある彼は、ある日、新人女優との密会不倫写真を撮られてしまう。一瞬で社会的地位と家族を失ってしまったナガジョー。だがこれはすべて仕組まれたことだった。その裏にいるのはまさかの人物。裏切り、秘密、策略が絡み合う、リコンエンターテインメントの第2弾!!
description.vi:
Nagase Jo (Gọi tắt là Nagajo), một nam diễn viên đầy tài năng và đức độ. Đồng thời còn là một người chồng thương vợ, người cha hết mực vì con cái. 
Thế nhưng, một đêm nọ, anh bị gài bẫy cho hành vi ngoại tình với một nữ diễn viên trẻ mới vào nghề. Nagajo lập tức mất hết vị thế xã hội, và hình ảnh người chồng, người cha trong mắt vợ và con cái. 
Tuy nhiên, đáng sợ hơn cả thảy là người đã rắp tâm gài bẫy anh lại chính là...!
Cuộc chiến hôn nhân phần 2 với chiến trường lần này là giới nghệ sĩ đầy lừa lọc chính thức bắt đầu.
description.es-la: La Segunda Parte de Un Divorcio Imposible, nos cuenta la casi imposible vida de nuestro protagonista "Takeshi Nagase" que tras una noche en la que perdio el conocimiento por culpa de una actriz malvada queda envuelto en un caso de supuesta violación y es alejado de sus hijos. ¡¿Una lucha por demostrar que es inocente?!

No God No Human
Non-Human

description.en: Chinese Mythical Beasts living in modern China.

altTitles.ja: 恥じらう君が見たいんだ

altTitles.zh-hk: 想看妳露出羞恥的模樣

altTitles.th: เทคนี้ที่ผมถ่ายเป็นเรื่องน่าอายที่เธอไม่คัท

description.en: Akito Shirasawa, a high school boy whose father is a film director, sees something in the library preparation room. It was the "masturbation scene" of his classmate, Kaho Honjou. Akito is puzzled, but ends up filming it with his smartphone. Kaho notices Akito, and in the men's restroom, makes a "proposal" to Akito! Exposed high school girl and movie boy.
description.ja:
「私の全てを、撮ってほしいの」

映画監督の父を持つ男子高校生・白沢明人はとある放課後に同級生・本上夏帆の自慰行為を目撃してしまう。困惑しながらもついスマホでそれを盗撮する白沢。しかしそれに気づいた本上は、白沢に驚きの提案を持ちかけて…!?
description.es-la: Akito Shirasawa, un chico de secundaria cuyo padre es director de cine, ve algo en la sala de preparación de la biblioteca. Era la "escena de la masturbación" de su compañera de clase, Natsuho Honjo. Akito está desconcertado, pero termina filmándolo con su teléfono inteligente. Natsuho nota a Akito, y en el baño de hombres, ¡le hace una "propuesta" a Akito! Chica de secundaria expuesta y chico de película. ¡Comienza el "amor expuesto" de la retorcida adolescencia!

altTitles.en: Kamakura Monster-Cat Club

description.en: There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club", located somewhere in Kamakura, you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today, people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club", where Maya and Gakuto work, relying on this rumor.

description.en: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】

description.en:
Suddenly, a fleet of ships with mysterious super-weapons called the "Fleet of Fog" appeared all around the world. Humanity didn't have the technology to fight such a fleet, so they were driven out of the sea…  
Seventeen years after the battle, for some reason, Gunzou Chihaya and his crewmates aboard the I-401 and the personification (Mental Model) of the I-401, Iona, started fighting the Fleet of Fog…

Wind Breaker (Nii Satoru)

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.ja: 彼らは、最強の不良軍団。そして、街の英雄───。偏差値は最底辺、喧嘩は最強。超不良校として名高い学校・風鈴（ふうりん）高校。この春、そんな風鈴のトップを目指して街にやってきた風鈴高校１年生・桜遥（さくらはるか）は、風鈴高校が“防風鈴（ボウフウリン）”と名付けられた街を守る集団となっていたことを知る。そして桜は、風鈴の一員として街を守るため戦い始めることに──！　不良高校生・桜の喧嘩英雄伝説、開幕!!
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

Imagine there is a bar with many weird kind of food and drink that might bring you to another world! The bar, so-called "Nobu" is located in a alley of the old city Aiteria. At the very first step, diners feels like falling into another completely country, with cold, super cool beer, so-called "Toriaezu Nama"! (from: MU)

Seeking the Dreaming Soul
Dream Seeking Soul

description.en: The world's misfortunes never cease. In the river of forgetfulness, the flowers and leaves have the same root but never see each other as messengers, can she unlock the secrets of each soul to free them?
description.zh: 世间的阴差阳错从未停歇，忘川中，花叶同根却永不相见的彼岸花化为使者，她能解开每个灵魂的秘密让她们解脱吗。

description.en:
Reborn in pursuit of revenge, I am sure I can easily achieve my goal, as I happen to be as rich as Bill Gates, as beautiful as Audrey Hepburn, and as deadly as deadpool. However, none of these above works when it comes to dealing with a sweating and panting CEO, who is poisoned, who is in need of "immediate relief."  
  
I'd love to help, but don't pull an ice-cool face when you're kissing me, sir!
description.vi: Cô, truyền nhân quỷ y, lại trùng sinh vào cơ thể một người đáng thương. Nói cô ngốc? Dùng thuật luyện đan hù chết ngươi! Cười cô thảm? Tùy tiện dùng y thuật cũng có thể khiến em gái xấu xa của mẹ kế thảm hơn! Trọng sinh một đời, Lâm Tố Nhi chỉ muốn thoải mái đánh tra nam ngược tra nữ, không ngờ lại chọc phải người đàn ông tôn quý nhất nước Hoa Hạ, ăn đậu hũ của người ta xong cô lại muốn vung chân bỏ chạy, không ngờ lại bị người đàn ông cường thế bắt về. "Tiểu nha đầu, ăn rồi phải chịu trách nhiệm, đạo lý này cần tôi dạy em sao?"

altTitles.ja: MFゴースト

description.en: In the year 202X, when self-driving electric and fuel-cell vehicles are ubiquitous, the racing organization MFG exists. Hosting races in Japan exclusively using cars with internal combustion engine. We follow young half-British, half-Japanese racing driver, Kanata Rivington. Who graduated at the top of his class in racing school and was invited into the series thanks to his teacher's connections.
description.ja: 西暦202X年。車の自動運転が普及した日本。そんな時代に、公道の自動車レースが開催されていた。世界中で人気を集めるレースの名はMFG。ポルシェ、フェラーリ、ランボルギーニなど最速を誇るマシンが次々に参戦していた。一方、イギリスのレーシングスクールを卒業したドライバー、カナタ・リヴィントンは、ある目的を果たすため日本に帰国するのであった。

altTitles.ja: 黒根さんはニャーと鳴かない

description.en: Mamoru Kitaoji is so popular in the company that he is called ''the prince of the sales department.'' In contrast, Ms. Kurone is a quiet colleague who is isolated from everyone around her. One day, on his way home from work, Kitadaiji sees Kurone-san enjoying herself in the park, taking care of a cat...?!

altTitles.ja: レッド・ベルベット

description.en: Set in Los Angeles, two troubled young men support each other and seek hope in the future. Earl collects the recipes for the cake shop his late mother left behind, while Randy got involved with a group of thieves and can't escape.

altTitles.ja: 自由気ままな精霊姫

description.en: Olivia, the daughter of the Cypherd family, is insidiously bullied by her stepmother and stepsisters. But she is unable to resist... Because Olivia's mind and body have been separated! Because of this, her body is always in a state of emptiness. Even so, she spends her days grieving, thinking of her late mother and her brother Sirius, who loved her when she was a child. One day, while tormented by bullies and unable to find an ally, her sister-in-law Anna makes a decision for Olivia...
description.ja: 継母と義妹に陰湿ないじめを受ける、サイファード家の令嬢・オリビア。しかし彼女は抵抗することができない…。なぜなら、オリビアは【心と体が分離してしまっている】から！そのせいで体は常に虚無状態。それでも幼い頃可愛がってくれたシリウス兄様や、亡き母を思いながら、悲しむ日々。味方も見つけられず、いじめに苦しめられていたある日、義妹・アンナはオリビアに対してある決断をして…。

altTitles.ja: 白蛇のはなむこ

altTitles.en: The White Snake's Bridegroom

description.en:
A white snake who is a divine messenger and a childhood friend with a mystery. Entangled obsessions in a Japanese-style fantasy.
Tsubaki, a high school student with a predisposition for bad luck, has a one-sided love for his childhood friend Sakuya, who is both beautiful and talented. Then, one day while leaving school they are randomly attacked on the street.

In the ancient capital Kyoto, a lovestory defying fate unfolds.
description.ja: 「遂に手に入れた――。女の、子宮……」 不運体質の高校生・椿。毎日、神社に祀られている傷だらけの狛へび像を拭いて磨くなど心優しい彼は、美人で文武両道、一学年上の幼馴染・咲陽に片思いしていた。そしてある日の下校中、二人は通り魔に襲われてしまい――!? 幸運の白蛇と大禍憑きの少年、そして謎を抱えた幼馴染。それぞれの執着が絡みつき、廻りだす――。古都京都。成り変わり偏愛譚、開幕。『あさこ』『いなり、こんこん、恋いろは。

altTitles.ja: 日本へようこそエルフさん。

altTitles.zh-hk: 歡迎來到日本，妖精小姐

altTitles.th: ขอต้อนรับสู่ญี่ปุ่นนะ คุณเอลฟ์

altTitles.vi: Chào mừng đến với Nhật Bản, Elf san!

description.en:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed. Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo?
___
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
description.ja: 社会人の北瀬一廣の趣味はとにかく寝ること。幼少のころからいつも見る不思議な夢の世界で彼は、胸躍る冒険をしていた。ある時、夢の中で仲良くなったエルフの少女と冒険をしていた際、運悪く魔導竜のブレスで共に焼かれてしまう。夢から覚め再び自分の部屋に戻るとそこには、いる筈のないエルフの少女が隣で寝ていて――。
description.ru: Обыкновенный сотрудник офиса Китасэ Кадзухиродавно живет только своей работой. Но все-таки он не совсем обычный человек, ведь он живет в Японии. Ежедневно по вечерам после работы он принимает душ, переодевается в домашнюю одежду и засыпает крепким сном. У Вас возникает вопрос: "Почему же тогда он необычный человек?" Правда в том, что во сне Китасэ живет в ином магическом мире и пробуждается только тогда, когда уснет или умрет там. Однажды, очнувшись после очередного сна он увидел...
description.pt-br: Kitase Kazuhiro é um assalariado comum que sempre deixa o escritório a tempo. Embora este seja o Japão, talvez ele não seja realmente comum, afinal. O que é verdadeiramente estranho vem depois disso; Toda noite, ele toma banho, troca seu pijama e tem uma boa noite de sono. Então ele sonha com um mundo de fantasia e só acorda quando morre ou dorme naquele mundo. Um dia, ele morreu depois de tropeçar no covil de um dragão. "Um pesadelo", ele acorda, até encontrar sua amiga elfa em sua cama. Curioso para ver uma elfa waifu experimentar a vida cotidiana no Japão? Como é andar com a fantasia de todo homem nas ruas de Tóquio? Este mangá é para todos vocês amantes elfos por aí!

title.en: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~

altTitles.ja: Destiny Unchain Online 〜吸血鬼少女となって、やがて『赤の魔王』と呼ばれるようになりました〜

altTitles.en: Destiny Unchain Online: After Becoming a Vampire Girl, I Eventually Became Known as "Crimson Demon King"

altTitles.th: Destiny Unchain Online เดสทินี อันเชน ออนไลน์ ~เมื่อผมกลายเป็นสาวน้อยผีดูดเลือดแล้วถูกขนานนามว่าจอมมารสีชาด~

altTitles.zh: Destiny Unchain Online 〜成为吸血鬼少女，不久后被称为『红之魔王』〜

altTitles.ko: Destiny Unchain Online 데스티니 언체인 온라인 〜흡혈귀 소녀가 되어, 이윽고『붉은 마왕』이라 불리게 되었습니다〜

altTitles.vi: Destiny Unchain Online: Bị biến thành thiếu nữ ma cà rồng, tôi được biết đến với tên gọi "Xích Sắc Ma Vương"

description.en: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
description.id: Mitsuki kou, seorang gamer dengan skill hebat yang memiliki nama lain,  yaitu "pemburu kepala Cream". Berpartisipasi dalam sebuah game baru "Destiny Unchain Online" yang dibuat oleh ayahnya sebagai tester perangkat game baru, tetapi segera setelah dimulai, karena sebuah bug ia menjadi gadis vampir. Ketika ia bertemu dengan teman-teman yang baik, pada saat itulah ia akan mulai menyelesaikan game, sebuah cerita tentang seorang gamer terbaik yang segala sesuatunya berubah…… sudah di mulai!
description.ja: 神がかったプレイヤースキルを持ち「首狩りクリム」の二つ名で知られるゲーマー、満月紅。父親が作った新作ゲーム『Destiny Unchain Online』に新型ゲームデバイスのテスターとして参加するが、開始早々バグだらけで姿は吸血鬼種族の少女に。最高の仲間と出会い、ゲームを攻略して行くうちに、何もかもが変わっていく最高のゲーマー物語……開幕！
description.ko: 압도적인 스킬을 가지고「목 사냥꾼 크림」이라는 별명으로 알려진 게이머, 미츠키 코우. 아버지가 만든 신작 게임 『Destiny Unchain Online』에 신형 게임 장치 테스터로 참가하지만, 시작하자마자 오류투성이로 흡혈귀 종족의 소녀가 되어 버리는데. 최고의 동료와 만나고, 게임을 공략해 나가다 보니,모든 것이 변해 가는 최강 게이머 이야기… 개막!
description.th: มิตสึกิ โค เกมเมอร์ฝีมือฉกาจที่รู้จักกันในนาม ‘คริมนักล่าหัว’ ได้เริ่มเล่นเกม ‘Destiny Unchain Online’ ที่พ่อของเขาสร้างในฐานะเทสเตอร์ของเครื่องเล่นเกมรุ่นใหม่ล่าสุด แต่ไม่ทันไรก็เจอบั๊กมากมายจนกลายเป็นเด็กสาวเผ่าผีดูดเลือดไปซะอย่างนั้น เรื่องราวของเกมเมอร์ผู้เก่งกาจที่ทุกอย่างเริ่มเปลี่ยนไปเมื่อได้พบกับพรรคพวกสุดเจ๋งและผจญภัยในโลกแห่งเกม... เปิดฉากแล้ว ณ บัดนี้!
description.vi: Kou Mitsuki là một game thủ với những kỹ năng phải nói là quá ghê gớm, có biệt danh là "Thợ săn táo Crim". Cậu tham gia thử nghiệm một thiết bị trò chơi mới cho trò chơi mới mà do chính cha của cậu tạo ra, "Destiny Unchained Online". Nhưng trò chơi đầy lỗi khi bắt đầu và phá vỡ giấc mộng trở thành nam ma cà rồng cool ngầu của cậu. Gặp gỡ những đồng minh tuyệt vời và bắt đầu cuộc chơi như vũ bão, câu chuyện về một game thủ hàng đầu nơi mà mọi thứ hay bất kì cái gì đều có thể thay đổi... bắt đầu!
description.pt-br: Mitsuki Kou é um jogador PVP tão temido que ganhou o apelido de "Crim, o Caçador de Cabeças" em alguns círculos. Seu próximo jogo para dominar? "Destiny Unchain Online", um novo jogo VRMMO desenvolvido por ninguém menos que o pai de Kou. Mas, nenhum jogo novo no dia do lançamento está livre de bugs - ou seja, Kou sofre um glitch para o meio do nada, e seu avatar de vampiro é transformado em uma garota! Uma história para todos que através dos jogos fizeram novos amigos e miraram no topo... comece!

altTitles.ja: 笑顔のたえない職場です。

altTitles.en: A Workplace Where You Can't Help But Smile

description.en: New shoujo manga artist Nana Futami works hard every day while being supported by Kaede Satou, her female editor who is older than her, and Mizuki Hazama, her assistant. According to the girl herself, she sometimes drums up intense daydream delusions of occupational illness!
description.ja: 新人少女漫画家の双見奈々先生は、年上の女性担当編集者の佐藤 楓さんやアシスタントの間 瑞希さんに支えられながら、時々本人曰く職業病の激しい妄想を拗らせながら、今日もお仕事中！
description.ko: 신인 작가 후타미는 본인이 말하길 망상은 직업병! 이라며 담당 사토 씨와 어시스턴트 하 씨에게 도움을 받으면서 오늘도 열심히 일한다! 만화계에서 일하는 어른의 청춘군상극. 대상 독자는 만화를 사랑하는 모든 사람 입니다.

altTitles.ja: アイツノカノジョ

altTitles.en: His Girlfriend

altTitles.fr: La petite amie de ce mec

description.en: It's April of my third and final year in high school... But the beautiful girl I have a crush on is my best friend's girlfriend. Thus begins my year of treading on the dangerous ground...
description.ja:
気になるあの娘は、”親友の”彼女。

始まりの季節、春。主人公・リクの家を訪れた美少女・雫は「いいよ、何しても。」と、リクを誘う。しかし雫は、“親友（アイツ）の彼女”。
description.pt-br: É abril do meu terceiro e último ano no ensino médio... Mas a linda garota por quem tenho uma queda é a namorada do meu melhor amigo. Assim começa meu ano pisando em um terreno perigoso...

altTitles.th: เบอร์เซิร์ก

altTitles.ja: ベルセルク

description.en:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
description.es: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.ru: Гатс – Черный Мечник, за которым охотятся демоны. Мечник стремится найти все убежища демонов и отомстить человеку, сделавшего их него «жертвенную овечку». Черный Мечник противостоит жестокой судьбе благодаря непоколебимой воле, невероятной силе, и, конечно же, меча. Постоянные сражения со злом приближает Гатса к параллельному миру тьмы, лишая его человечности. Берсерк – сложная, но сильная история о сражениях и злой судьбе.
description.th:
เบอร์เซิร์ก เป็นชื่อมังงะ แนวดาร์ค แฟนตาซี ของญี่ปุ่น วาดโดยเคนทาโร่ มิอุระ มีการดำเนินเรื่องเกิดขึ้นในยุคกลางของยุโรป โดยได้รับอิทธิพลมาจากโลกแห่งจินตนิมิตด้านมืด มีตัวละครเอกของเรื่องคือ กัทส์ ทหารรับจ้างผู้โดดเดี่ยวและ กริฟฟิท หัวหน้าของกลุ่มทหารรับจ้างที่รวมตัวกันภายใต้ชื่อ กองพันเหยี่ยว

----
 [Shopee (ไทย)](https://shopee.co.th/berserk%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8B%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B8%81-%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%8A%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%84-%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%81%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1-1-20-%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B6%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87-i.63434898.1855330863)
description.tr:
Kara Kılıç Ustası olarak anılan Guts, vücutlarındaki şeytani damga yüzünden onlara musallat olan şeytani güçlerden, kadınını ve kendisini korumanın bir yolunu aramaktadır. Aynı zamanda onu damgalayan ve bir kurban konumuna düşüren adamdan intikam almaya çalışmaktadır. Paralı askerlerle geçirdiği zorlu çocukluk yıllarının getirdiği tecrübeler sayesinde elde ettiği büyük gücü, devasa bir kılıç ve protez bir kol ile destekleyen Guts, karamsar kaderiyle mücadele etmek zorundadır. Tüm bunları yaparken, insani benliğini kaybetmesine neden olabilecek öfkeyle başa çıkmalıdır. 

TheWildDeer'dan Dorylaion tarafından biraz yorum katılarak sitedeki ingilizce açıklamadan çevrilmiştir.
description.uk: Його ім'я Ґатс, Чорний Мечник. Він могутній воїн, про якого говорять лишень пошепки. У нього є велетенський меч , рука зі заліза й шрами від незліченних боїв і тортур. А ще його плоть позначена Тавром — нечестивим символом, який притягує сили пітьми й робить Ґатса їхньою жертвою. Але Ґатс не прийме таку долю спокійно: він порубає на фарш війська проклятих, як і будь-кого, кому стане дурості стати на його шляху! Ґатс іде в товаристві ельфа Пака (більше докучайла, ніж товариша) темним і закривавленим шляхом, який приведе лише до загибелі... Чи помсти.
description.es-la: Guts, conocido como el Espadachín Negro, busca refugio de las fuerzas demoníacas que se sienten atraídas por él y su mujer debido a una marca demoníaca en el cuello, además de vengarse del hombre que lo marcó como un sacrificio impío. Únicamente con la ayuda de su fuerza titánica, adquirida tras una dura infancia vivida con mercenarios, una espada gigantesca y una prótesis de hierro en la mano izquierda, Guts deberá luchar contra su sombrío destino, al tiempo que combate con una rabia que podría despojarle de su humanidad.
description.pt-br: Guts, conhecido como o Espadachim Negro, busca refúgio das forças demoníacas atraídas por ele e sua mulher por causa de uma marca demoníaca em seus pescoços, e também vingança contra o homem que o marcou como um sacrifício profano.  Ajudado apenas por sua força titânica adquirida de uma infância dura vivida com mercenários, uma espada gigantesca e uma mão esquerda protética de ferro, Guts deve lutar contra seu destino sombrio, enquanto luta com uma raiva que pode despojá-lo de sua humanidade.

description.en:
The urban workplace light comedy begins! From Zhou Yi to Zhou Mo, endless laughter everyday! The poorest second-generation millionaire Husky x A hot tempered and intelligent woman in the city. When a Husky becomes a intern, there is no escape from disaster!
"Promotions! Bonuses! Pay raises! Discipline(?) a Husky!"

altTitles.en: Difficult to Coax
Hard to Coax
First Frost

description.en: When Wen Yifan returned to her hometown for work, she met the rumoured “First-Class Handsome Guy” in a bar, but he turned out to be Sang Yan, whom she hurt and rejected in high school! In a twist of fate, the two people who could never get along kept bumping into each other. They even rented the same unit by chance and became housemates! Unspoken feelings refusing to see the light of day, strong emotions stirring beneath it all… Let’s see how Sang Yan, the “Peak Ideal Boyfriend” interprets and expresses deep affections and sweet love!

altTitles.en: A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!

altTitles.ja: 妖怪学校の先生はじめました！

altTitles.tr: Ghoul Okulunda Dehşete Düşmüş Bir Öğretmen

description.en: Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms, but he also wants to be a good teacher. However, his new school isn’t exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters, demons, ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!

altTitles.ja: 少女星間漂流記

description.en: A spaceship in the shape of a horse-drawn carriage travels across the galaxy. Riding in the carriage is Ridley, the scientist who built this eccentric spaceship, and her partner Watari, a shy girl. The two leave Earth, which has become uninhabitable due to environmental pollution, and set off in the carriage. Their goal is to find a safe planet to settle. However, all the planets they visit are very strange! A planet with a god who can bring all things back to life, another planet where the luckiest people are considered the greatest, and a planet with countless libraries… The two girls are sometimes thrown for a loop by these strange worlds…
